generatedTitle: The Creation of the Chamber of Secrets by Salazar Slytherin

extractFactDictList.question: Who created the Chamber of Secrets?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Chamber of Secrets in the Harry Potter series was created by Salazar Slytherin.

extractFactDictList.question: Where was the Chamber of Secrets built?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The chamber was created under the dungeons of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry during Medieval times.
extractFactDictList.phrase: Under the dungeons of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

extractFactDictList.question: Why was the Chamber of Secrets created?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Salazar Slytherin, who disagreed with the other Hogwarts founders on the merits of blood purity, built this chamber with the hope of purging the school of those he considered unworthy to study magic.
extractFactDictList.phrase: To purge the school of those considered unworthy to study magic
